description: Chris Swallow's bike burst into flames in the high speed crash at Ballaugh Bridge, an inquest hears.
title: Chris Swallow: Classic TT rider's death a 'tragic accident'
title_page: Chris Swallow: Classic TT rider's death a 'tragic accident' - BBC News
maintext: Although there were no protective barriers in the area on the day of the incident, they were put in place for the remainder of the races.
